We show how a Supertagger can be used to drastically reduce the syntactic lexical ambiguity for a given input and can be used in combination with an LTAG parser to radically improve parsing efficiency .We then turn our attention to from parsing efficiency to parsing accuracy and provide a method by which we can effectively combine the output of a Supertagger and a statistical LTAG parser using a co - training algorithm for bootstrapping new labeled data .
